content.prompt: Which of the following decisions is most likely to cite the Supreme Court’s decision in Tinker v. Des Moines Independent Community School District (1969) as a legal precedent in support of the decision?

choices.label: A decision in favor of students holding signs that protest a new policy
A decision against a public school’s practice of having prayer at school assemblies
A decision supporting the creation of gun-free zones in public schools
A decision enforcing mandatory vaccinations for all children before attending school

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain how a required Supreme Court case relates to a relevant political principle, institution, process, policy, or behavior.
